Articles.Content: Hello! So the title pretty much says it, I started the game with Kopernicus and all the instructed mods in the folder that evolution mod comes with, but only the normal ksp planets are there. Evolution is working because i see the vortex around the sun, so why aren't the planets loading?
With a quick look on the website, it says that the mod is out of date. You most likely are using 1.4.5, when the mod is made for 1.3.1. So I am sorry, but it is looking pretty much unusable.
